name: Bash to the moon !
description:
Game :

Bash To The Moon is a text adventure game where you have to launch a rocket to the moon by sending request on a terminal.

Instructions :

Type to your keyboard to sent command to the terminal.

Hint :

It seems like the game is too hard, so I will put some help here.
1st advice read the checklist it can help you to know the way to follow.

Credits :

Sprites and Game Development by me.

Music (from icons8.com) by Acedis.

Sound effects (from freesound.org) by minian89, baumstumpf, hifijohn, kangaroovindaloo, florianreichelt, inuetc, matrixxx.

Some symbol used to do emoji doesn't work on browser and I don't know why... (|||❛︵❛。)

You can still download standalone version with links below to see them.
